response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We believe in valuing our clients' needs and desires, and we are confident that this product will significantly benefit you. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we are offering it to you at a special price of $1,350,000. This is a fantastic deal considering the product's true value to you stands at $1,200,000. We hope you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing its details further. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to contact us. Best regards, [Your Name] - [Your Company]", "product_price": 1350000}
